Name: RSS
Desc: This section lets you configure how the RSS shell works.

Keys.Name: RSS feed URL prompt style
Keys.Description: Write how you want your RSS feed server prompt to be. Leave blank to use default style. Placeholders are parsed.

Keys.Name: Auto refresh RSS feed interval
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to refresh the RSS feed?

Keys.Name: RSS feed fetch timeout
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to wait before RSS feed fetch timeout?
